title: thanigai malai mEyvum
sahitya:
taNigai malai mEvum punidan malarpadamE 
paNindiDuvAy manamE dinamE 
(taNigai)


anupallavi

ninaindurugum aDiyAr tuyar kaLaindE 
iNai illA mAmaNiyAy tigazhndE aruLum tiru 
(taNigai)                                                 


caraNam

dAsa jana lOlan nEsa guNALan 
Iswari gowri manOhari bAlan 
kEsavanin marugan muruga vaDivElan 
pAsamuDan parindaruLum dayALan (taNigai)
